State of Utah Restricts Non-urgent Surgeries on March 24 2020.
column7: Restriction and Regulation of Government Services

column3: Gov. Gary R. Herbert of Utah, USA, has issued an Executive Order instituting a moratorium on residential evictions fort a small number of individuals who are unable to pay rent due to direct and identifiable impacts of COVID-19 on April 1 2020.
Steward Health Care offers COVID-19 drive-through testing at three hospital locations in Utah, USA from April 6 2020

Utah, USA will, for the first time, deploy a targeted wireless emergency alert (WEA) on certain highways that cross state borders into Utah. The alert will direct motorists to fill out a brief declaration, or survey, that is available at entry.utah.gov.
Gov. Herbert of Utah, USA, on April 9 2020, has issued an Executive Order establishing a requirement for individuals entering Utah to complete a travel declaration form.

Utah, USA will use electronic message boards instead of text alerts to alert motorists of health declaration order from April 13 2020. Arriving airline passengers will continue receiving postcards directing them to entry.utah.gov.
Gov. Gary Herbert, of Utah, USA, along with state superintendent Syd Dickson announced that public schools will extend their “soft closure” until the end of the school year.
Gov. Gary Herbert, of Utah, USA, along with state superintendent Syd Dickson announced that public schools will extend their “soft closure” until the end of the school year.
